Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.spring

Class FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.spring.FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.test.context.ContextCustomizer
public class FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer extends Object implements org.springframework.test.context.ContextCustomizer
A custom Spring ContextCustomizer that scans additional base packages for Spring components.

This class is used to dynamically include extra packages during the Spring context initialization, ensuring that relevant beans and configurations are detected. It is particularly useful when extending the test context beyond the default package scanning.

The customizer is applied by scanning the specified basePackages in an AnnotationConfigApplicationContext, enabling the framework to discover and register additional beans for test execution.

Instances of this class compare equality based on the basePackages array, ensuring that duplicate customizers are not applied unnecessarily.
